data.text: @rrcrazy23 Hi, your benefits with us will depend on your category, find more information here: https://t.co/h8UNjFWOEb. Regards.
@gitaneee Hi, we sent you a DM.
@sodapopwitch Hello, tell us more details of what happened via DM, along with your reservation code, in order to assist you, we remain attentive.
@biciklomposvetu The refund can take from 7 to 15 days. Rest assured that once we have issued the voucher, we will email it to you. Regards.
@biciklomposvetu Hi, refund is in process. You will get an email with your travel voucher number. Regards.
@aquilmsc19 Hi, send us a DM with the ticket number to assist you.
@SRubin1957 Hi, send us a DM with your travel voucher number. We will also request the bank information through this means.
@melicious_6 Hi, we sent you a DM.
@miquele2009 Hi, please try again in the next hours clearing the cookies of your browser. Regards.

@azulsan33004766 Hola, podemos asistirte por este medio evaluando la disponibilidad de nuestras operaciones, solo envianos los datos con relación a tu reserva a través de DM. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@_neelimaa Hi, send us your booking code and full name through a DM to check the information. Regards.

@diegocao10 Hola, ten en cuenta que es responsabilidad del pasajero conocer y cumplir con las restricciones de viaje de los países correspondientes. Si quieres hacer algún cambio, puedes enviarnos tu código de reserva a través de un DM. Saludos.
@maskedmagik We sent you a DM.
@NicoCarri Hola, te hemos respondido vía DM. Saludos.
@Luna_Klaus11 Hello, we answer you by DM. Regards.
@flor_d_kocorita We have sent you a response via DM, regards.
@mamma0113 We replied to your DM. Regards.
@mamma0113 We sent you a DM. Regards.
@carlosarias10 We assure you that we'll send a prompt response about your case through email. Regards.
@carlosarias10 Hi, we are still working on your case, and we'll send a response as soon as possible. Regards.
@carlosarias10 As soon as we have any update about your request, we will notify you. Regards.

In 2021, our most important journey will be towards #ANecessaryDestination. This is our promise to the world, to reduce our environmental impacts and collaborate with South America when it needs it most. Find out more at https://t.co/VmDB77DEoC https://t.co/BAJKOve5pO
@carlosarias10 Hi, we continue working on your case and will get back to you as soon as possible with an update. Thanks.
@ChrisDominguez We've replied through DM, regards.
@ChrisDominguez We've replied through DM, regards.

@ChrisDominguez In order to check if there is a booking code registered in our system, please send us via DM your complete name, identification number, email address, phone number, date and route of the trip. Regards.
@ChrisDominguez We are verifying that we don't have any inconvenience with our website. We suggest trying throughout the day. Remember our fares are subject to changes. Regards.
@JohnGonzalezUK Hi, we replied to you via DM. Regards.

@ChrisDominguez In that case, you'll have to pay a service fee. Send us through DM your phone number, dates, flight routes and full name in order to assist you. Keep in mind that you'll need a credit card.
@performairint ✈🙌
@ChrisDominguez Hi, please try again clearing the cookies of your browser. Regards.

@jimmoraga Hi, the booking process can be affected by the history of the browser, cookies and cache, we suggest deleting them as well as using another browser. If the inconvenient persists, please send a print of the error via DM and let us know the flight you wish to book. Regards.

@JohnGonzalezUK John, we understand your annoyance, in order to assist you it is necessary that you provide us with the information required above. We will do our best to assist you in your request. Regards.
@aaronduh Hi, if you need assistance, send us a DM with your booking code. Regards.

@JohnGonzalezUK Hi, please provide us your reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) including the details of the change you want to make via DM in order to help you. We will be waiting for your response. Regards.

#AttentionPassengers: Our flight offers from/to Chile in May are already available. You can learn about them at https://t.co/pxuBw9jPIv  If you need to manage or make changes to your flight, you can do it from the "My Trips" section. https://t.co/DumaukgrR2
@mahumada_laura1 Hola, por este medio podemos asistirte con el cambio. Por favor envíanos un DM con las nuevas fechas del viaje. Saludos.
@ramosri Hello, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@ramosri Hello, we can help you, send us a DM with the information. Regards.
@mahumada_laura1 Hola, para mayor asistencia envíanos el código de reserva y nombre completo. Quedamos atentos.
@Alexand95791879 Hello, in order to check the information please send us via DM the booking code or ticket number and the full name of the passenger. We will await for your reply.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: Are you planning to travel soon? These are the steps you must follow to find out information about your flight status and, if it’s necessary, you can self-manage the changes by entering here https://t.co/3yWBshsqRz https://t.co/pzSX7F8FTc
@LilBearBeary Hi, your case is still open and we keep working on it. We will get in contact with you through the corresponding means as soon as we have any update about it. Regards.

@lapinblanc257 Hola, a fin de poder verificar lo que nos comentas, por favor envíanos por privado mayor detalle de lo ocurrido, si cuentas con código de reservación y nombre completo del pasajero. Quedamos atentos.

urls.title: Travel requirements | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Know the restrictions to travel inside and outside of Chile.

data.text: @djkarlitonyc Hi, the negative PCR test is requested to passengers arriving from the UK. Passengers coming from other countries doesn't need to provide the negative CODIV-19 test upon arrival, but will be subject to a health screening. Check more information here: https://t.co/bsrW7s2dEZ.

urls.title: Travel requirements | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Know the restrictions to travel inside and outside of United States.

data.text: @minibe231 Hi, at the moment we don't have have a date for our flights to South Africa. You can check our operating route here: https://t.co/r4G9lOdO4a. Regards.
@msvirsky Hi, please send us a DM with the name of the passenger. Regards.
@Jessica60855954 Hi, if you need assistance, send us through DM your ticket number, booking code and full name of the passenger. We'll be waiting for your reply.
@SergioBustaG We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@juanitomendes Hi, in order to help you please send us more details about your case via DM. Regards.
@marcusreis31 Hello, the case 31291294 is still in process, due to the high demand the resolution of cases is taking longer than scheduled, we will contact you by email as soon as possible. Regards.

urls.title: More flexibility to travel | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Check out the flexible purchase options we have for your next trip.

data.text: @mitoyarzun Hi, the information is here: https://t.co/YsKqBdvUCg. You can make a change just once. It will be subject to fare difference. Regards.
@marcusreis31 Hi, we are working on your request, stay tuned to your email for more information. Regards.
@JasonG25877628 Hi, send us a DM with your booking code and details of your requirement to assist you. Thanks.
@Luna_Klaus11 Hi Luna, in order to help you please send us your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and your full name through our DM. We'll stay tuned.
@Jacquel75807697 Hi, we have sent you a DM. Regards.
@peterinVitoria Our operation is subject to changes and it is being updated constantly. Visit our website in the following day to check our availability. Regards.
@peterinVitoria We do have direct flight form Vitoria to Rio de Janeiro. Through this link previously provided, you can quote your trip. Regards.
@peterinVitoria Hi, we are still operating from Vitoria to Rio de Janeiro. We kindly invite you to quote your trip here: https://t.co/hKSrGRgWb5. Regards.
@paulagsali Hello, we have responded by DM, greetings.
@PaolaMendizbal1 We replied to your DM. Regards.
@PaolaMendizbal1 Hi, send us a DM with your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), the full name of one of the passengers, and confirm if you mean a refund. We'll stay tuned.
@SoSuperfreak Hemos registrado tus comentarios en tu caso. En cuanto tengamos una respuesta, nos comunicaremos contigo. Saludos.
@lucinete_leal Hi, if you need assistance, please send us a DM with more details. Regards.
@CalledtoGO1 No issues have been reported, and we've done a simulation, and we had no issued either. Try using a different device. Regards.
@CalledtoGO1 Hello, sometimes cookies can affect the searching experience on our website, we recommend you delete them or try a different browser, because we have no reported problems. Regards.
@silkamusic We have sent you a response via DM, regards.
@silkamusic Hello, according to your comments, please send us via DM further information. We will await for your reply, regards.
@willthe_3rd Hello, send us by inbox your reservation code or ticket number to be able to assist you. Regards.
@RosaVidarte Hello, in order to give you the proper information let us know your booking code or ticket number through DM. Regards.
@peterinVitoria We have sent you a response via DM, regards.
@peterinVitoria Hello, please send us via DM the ticket number you are referring to, we will await for your reply.
@_Siles_ Por favor aguarda nuestro contacto. Saludos.
@Soledad18929363 Hola, hemos respondido vía DM. Saludos.
@Soledad18929363 Para mayor asistencia es necesario que nos envíes los datos solicitados vía DM. Quedamos atentos.
@marcelovergara Hola, para poderte asistir, es necesario que nos envíes vía DM, los siguientes datos: código de reserva o ticket, nombre completo y documento de identidad. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.

@TaylorBryant10 Hello Taylor, tell us how we can assist you through our DM. 
Regards.
@TaylorBryant10 Hello,  send us a DM with your booking code. Regards.
@xiaoyupau Hi, we have sent a response through DM. Regards.
@riley_globetrtr Hi, it is not possible to use your miles or points in order to leave your ticket open. Regards.
@xiaoyupau Hi, we have sent a response through DM. Regards.
@xiaoyupau Hi, send us through DM more details about your request in order to assist you. We'll be waiting for your reply.
@lucyinthasky___ Hola, con el fin de asistirte envianos tu código de reserva y nombres completos vía DM. Quedamos atentos.
@joaquitomurdoch Envíanos por DM tu número de caso o código de reserva para poder asistirte. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@joaquitomurdoch Hola, déjanos saber por DM si hay algo en lo que podamos ayudarte. Quedamos atentos.
@whocaresabout99 Hello Dave, in order to assist you, provide us with more information about your requirement through our DM. Regards.

@LinarusLean Hola, para consultas o solicitudes respecto al Club LATAM Pass, debes comunicarte a través del chat incluido en la página del club: https://t.co/U8pumL5Fdv. Te podemos asistir en inglés o español, indícanos el idioma de tu preferencia. Saludos.

@seba_nyc Hola, nos encontramos realizando las gestiones respectivas en tu caso para brindarte una respuesta en el menor tiempo posible. Por favor espera nuestro contacto vía correo electrónico. Saludos.
@richardayas Hola, hemos intentado contactar al pasajero vía telefónica sin éxito. Por favor quedamos a la espera de su respuesta vía correo electrónico. Saludos.
@chilenadechile Hi, you can send us your query through a DM too if you want. We can assist you through here. Our call center number in Chile is 600 526 2000. Regards.
@AndreBaldera We will contact you via email as soon as possible, please wait for our contact. Regards.
@AndreBaldera We replied to your DM. Regards.
@AndreBaldera Can you send us a DM with the case number to check its status, please?
@AndreBaldera Hi, try clearing the history and cookies, because they can affect the functioning of our website, as well as using a different device. Regards.
@Alfredo25366967 Hola te hemos brindado respuesta vía DM. Saludos.

@alnxavier Hello, we understand your position and have the certainty that we are working in your refund request. In this case, we can not provide you an estimate date due to the high demand in these type of requests. Please, wait for our contact, regards.

@winenot21 We know that our greatest commitment is to deliver the resolution that you are waiting for, and we are working in favor of that commitment. Please have the certainty that we will contact you as soon as we have an update. Regards.
@winenot21 Hi, we replied to you via DM. Regards.
@winenot21 We've replied through DM. Regards.
@winenot21 Hi, in order to check the information. Please provide via DM, the case number and the email registered in it. We'll be awaiting your response.
